_instructions.apiKey: Replace with your API key from Obsidian Local REST API plugin settings
_instructions.host: IP address where Obsidian is running (default: 127.0.0.1 for local)
_instructions.location: Save this file to ~/.config/mcp/obsidian.json or set OBSIDIAN_CONFIG_FILE environment variable

local.description: Default for Obsidian running on the same machine

remote.description: For Obsidian running on another machine in your network

custom_port.description: If you changed the default port in Obsidian REST API settings
